org.parboiled
Class RecordingParseRunner<V>

java.lang.Object
  org.parboiled.BasicParseRunner<V>
      org.parboiled.RecordingParseRunner<V>
Type Parameters:
V - the type of the value field of a parse tree node
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParseRunner<V>
public class RecordingParseRunner<V>
extends BasicParseRunner<V>

A ParseRunner implementation that records the location of the first InvalidInputError found, without actually creating a InvalidInputError instance and adding it to the list of ParseErrors. It never causes the parser to perform more than one parsing run and it rarely used directly. Instead its functionality is relied upon by the ReportingParseRunner and RecoveringParseRunner classes.

Nested Class Summary
static class RecordingParseRunner.Handler<V>
          A MatchHandler implementation keeping track of the furthest match in the current input buffer, and therefore the first location corresponding to an InvalidInputError.

getErrorLocation

public InputLocation getErrorLocation()
Returns the InputLocation of the first InvalidInputError in the input text. Must not be called before the BasicParseRunner.run() has been called.

Returns:
the InputLocation of the first parse error or null, if the input is error free.
